# MTLArgumentBuffersTier.tier2

**Case**

Support for tier 2 argument buffers.

## Declaration

```swift
case tier2
```

## Discussion

Tier 2 argument buffers are supported on all macOS discrete GPUs.

## Enumeration cases

- **MTLArgumentBuffersTier.tier1**: Support for tier 1 argument buffers.
